page.title: 18HOSPITAL 3
page.content: {WINESTEAD HOSPITAL} A mini-bus transporting staff meets the service bus on the 1033 Withernsea to Hull Road for each staff change; the first run at 0645, the last at 2100, running every hour in between except between 1015 and 1200. This is when the bus is used as free transport to Withernsea enabling people living in the nearby Staff houses, staff and patients to go shopping. No runs are operated between 1400 and 1600 hours. Another bus runs between Winestead and Tilworth Grange Hospital in Hull taking dirty laundry and exchanging internal mail. At the entrance to the Hospital are 10 houses, 9 of which are rented to staff. The 10th house, a detached 4 bedroomed building is a half way house where patients, under supervision are taught cooking before going into supervised shared homes.
